actions.message:
That role is for users who know much about DBM
because it can be mentioned for help reasons.
`!helper`
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
If you want to get pinged if we release a new update or something similar make sure to do the following command:
`!notified`
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
Before we release a version of DBM Mods we always test it. If you want to help us do the following command:
`!beta`
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
If you want to publish raw data on our server follow these steps please:
1. Upload you raw data on http://dbm-mods.xyz/raw or another paste services of your choice.
2. Think about a category (useful, api-use, moderating, music, minigames, troll or run-scripts)
3. Do `!post category text`
Note: You aren't able to edit your submission again!
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
Maybe you need raw data? Or do you have a nice idea but you don't want to do it yourself?
Then you can publish a request into #raw-requests!
Just do:
`!request idea`
Note: You cannot edit your request again!
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
That role is for users who know much about DBM
because it can be mentioned for help reasons.
`!helper`
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
You can suggest modifications here. Please write exactly what you want!
`!suggest [text]`
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
From time to time we go live and stream some Q&A or direct support streams.
If you want to get a notification do the following command:
`!live`
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
You can join language specific chats using
`!german`
`!turkish`
`!french`
`!israeli`
`!spanish`
(Only these languages are available at the moment!)
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message: üìõ Currently only available in the staff Discord!
actions.name: Send Message

actions.topic: Please verify that you're a human!
actions.name: Create Text Channel

actions.message:
1.1 These rules apply to *all* DBM Network Services. If you get warned/kicked/banned this will also happen on the other services.
1.2 The Moderators are allowed to warn you and if you got a problem with that warning ask them. But they are allowed to block you or mute you.
1.3 Our servers aren't official! There is only *one* official DBM Server.
1.4 All rules of the official server does also apply here! Make sure to read them on the official server!
1.5 We can change these rules at any time given. If one of those rules does not apply anymore, the others will still do.
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
2.1 Use the *Search function* included in Discord to search for what you need or for solutions to problems you are having *before asking or suggesting!*
2.2 Mentioning random or specific users for help reasons is not allowed
2.3 Mentioning Helpers should be done *after* a few minutes after you send your question
2.4 All support is done voluntarily, so please do not hold any expectations and respect those that try to help
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
3.1 NSFW content is strictly forbidden
3.2 Advertising is forbidden (Discord Invites too!)
3.3 Random memes, emojis or messages are forbidden
3.4 Spamming messages and/or mentions is forbidden 
3.5 The rules does apply to messages, media, profile picture and name.
3.6 You are not allowed to publish other users raw data as your own
3.7 Any hateful messages to a group or person are strictly forbidden
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
4.1 It is not allowed to DM or mention Staff Members for help reasons
4.2 It is not allowed to ask to become Moderator or another staff person
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
5.1 Getting a warning point on one server of the unofficial servers network means one warning point on all of them
5.2 Getting a warning point on the officical DBM server *can* also result a warning point on the unofficial server network
5.3 Wrong reactions on suggestions, raw data or raw data requests can be warned
5.4 Spamming the request raw data, raw data posting or suggestion system is not allowed
5.5 On all DBM Network Services [this Privacy Policy](https://dbm-network.com/privacy-policy/) applies.
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
**Welcome!**
Please follow the instructions below. üòâ
(If you cannot see any instructions for you please try to rejoin)
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: üòù If you can see this... the system is activated!
actions.name: Send Message
Run Script

actions.message:
1.1 These rules apply to all DBM Network Services. If you get warned/kicked/banned this will also happen on the other services.
1.2 The Moderators are allowed to warn you, and you are allowed to ask for a reason or appeal the warning. However, Moderators are also allowed to block or mute you.
1.3 The rules of the Official server do not apply in DBM Network Services. Please read the Official server's rules as well.
1.4 We may change these rules at any given time. If one of the rules don't apply anymore, the others still will.
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
2.1 Use the Search function included in Discord to search for what you need or for solutions to problems you are having before asking or suggesting!
2.2 Mentioning random or specific users for help reasons is not allowed.
2.3 Mentioning Helpers should be done after a few minutes after you send your question.
2.4 All support is done voluntarily, so please do not hold any expectations and respect those who try to help.
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
3.1 NSFW content is strictly forbidden.
3.2 Advertising is forbidden (Exceptions on DBM Store).
3.3 Random memes, emojis or messages are forbidden (Exeptions on DBM Hub).
3.4 Spamming messages/mentions/reacts is forbidden. 
3.5 These rules also apply to messages, media, profile picture and name.
3.6 You are not allowed to publish other users' Raw Data as your own.
3.7 Any hateful messages, slurs, or provocations to a group or individual are strictly forbidden.
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
4.1 Warnings are shared between all DBM Network Servers, you will have the same amount of warnings in any of them.
4.2 Getting warning points in the Official DBM server may also result in you receiving warning points in the DBM Network.
4.3 You will be warned for using the wrong reactions in Raw Data or Suggestions.
4.4 Spamming the request raw data, raw data posting or suggestion system is not allowed
4.5 [This Privacy Policy](https://dbm-network.com/privacy-policy/) applies to all DBM Network Services.
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
You can use premade messages to answer to often asked questions
using our "info" command.
Type `!info [infoname]` to get such a message.

Infonames:
`./constants`, `hosting`, `servers`, `beta`, `google`, `dbm2`, `cmd`, `verify`, `heroku`, `installerror`, `ffmpeg`, `install-modules`, `music`, `npm`, `one-channel`, `howtobecool`, `embed`, `closedservers`, `fntfile`, `embedhelp`, `embeds`, `hub`, `rawdata`, `mods`, `store`
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
Check out our team!
`!team`

Ping and Ram of the Bot?
`!botinfo`

Mhh... What did these guys save from me? Let's check it!
`!mydata`

"Wow! thank you DBM Network" or "Ew DBM Network - go away"?
Please send us feedback.
`!feedback text`
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
You can send reputation points each 12 hours to someone using:
`!rep @User`
View your own stats using:
`!me`
actions.name: Add Embed Field
